title: Stratified Sculptures
description: I developed software in Houdini for artist studio, Troika, to allow them the ability to slice and recombine ancient sculptures in a myriad of ways. Then, I assisted in fabricating a life-size version of this sculpture, creating molds and casting positives.

captions.1: Original sculpture, before being used for mold-making
captions.5: Individual cast pieces of the final sculpture
captions.8: Renderings of possible configurations generated by the algorithm
